医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
结合苹果皮和槲寄生提取物，促进肌肉健康和耐力研究表明，槲寄生和苹果皮提取物可以改善肌肉健康和耐力，这表明这是一种对抗与年龄相关的肌肉衰退的自然方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Combining-apple-peel-and-mistletoe-extracts-to-boost-muscle-health-and-endurance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Combining-apple-peel-and-mistletoe-extracts-to-boost-muscle-health-and-endurance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=52c26125-709e-42a2-be7d-df8e52b94af2 Tue, 01 Oct 2024 06:12:00 -0400 Combining apple peel and mistletoe extracts to boost muscle health and endurance
ERS Genomics 与蒙特利尔大学签署 CRISPR/Cas9 许可协议蒙特利尔大学获得 ERS ​​Genomics 的 CRISPR/Cas9 专利，推出全基因组筛选平台并促进研究合作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/ERS-Genomics-and-Universite-de-Montreal-sign-CRISPRCas9-license-agreement.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/ERS-Genomics-and-Universite-de-Montreal-sign-CRISPRCas9-license-agreement.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=29e46e03-f4bd-493d-9876-3ad7222cd973 Tue, 01 Oct 2024 05:44:00 -0400 ERS Genomics and Université de Montréal sign CRISPR/Cas9 license agreement
Sphere Fluidics 宣布推出 Cyto-Mine Chroma，以加速和简化生物治疗发现和开发中扩展应用的工作流程Cyto-Mine Chroma 通过先进的多重分析和检测灵活性增强了单细胞分析，优化了研究人员的功能筛选工作流程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Sphere-Fluidics-announces-Cyto-Mine-Chroma-to-accelerate-and-streamline-workflows-across-expanded-applications-in-biotherapeutic-discovery-和-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Sphere-Fluidics-announces-Cyto-Mine-Chroma-to-accelerate-and-streamline-workflows-across-expanded-applications-in-biotherapeutic-discovery- and-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2ca62f8-abe0-487c-aa63-65aca4479945 Tue, 01 Oct 2024 05:40:00 -0400 Sphere Fluidics announces Cyto-Mine Chroma to accelerate and streamline workflows across expanded applications in biotherapeutic discovery and development
精神疾病患者的 COVID-19 疫苗接种率较高，但未接受药物治疗的患者接种率下降研究人员检查了精神疾病与 COVID-19 疫苗接种率之间的联系，发现有精神健康问题的未接受药物治疗的个体的疫苗接种率较高，但接种率较低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/COVID-19-vaccine-uptake-higher-in-people-with-mental-illness-but-drops-for-those-not-on-medication。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/COVID-19-vaccine-uptake-higher-in-people-with-mental-illness-but-drops-for-those-not-on-medication。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c3f57b4f-2c17-45f0-883b-190a74bebd43 Tue, 01 Oct 2024 02:04:00 -0400 COVID-19 vaccine uptake higher in people with mental illness but drops for those not on medication
人工智能在脑肿瘤诊断方面优于放射科医生随着人工智能的进步，其在现实世界应用中的用途和能力不断达到新的高度，甚至可能超越人类的专业知识。在放射学领域，正确的诊断对于确保适当的患者护理至关重要，大型语言模型（例如 ChatGPT）可以提高准确性或至少提供良好的第二意见。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/AI-outperforms-radiists-in-brain-tumor-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/AI-outperforms-radiists-in-brain-tumor-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc13a5fc-e91b-4593-95e7-deefdfb7f096 Tue, 01 Oct 2024 01:34:59 -0400 AI outperforms radiologists in brain tumor diagnosis
研究人员质疑用“癌症”来治疗某些前列腺疾病牛津大学出版社出版的《国家癌症研究所杂志》上的一篇新论文表明，如果医生不再将前列腺的某些早期变化称为“癌症”，患者可能会受益。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Researchers-question-the-use-of-cancer-for-certain-prostate-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Researchers-question-the-use-of-cancer-for-certain-prostate-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d67e22fc-a5b5-4937-abe0-eb3e7bc5f509 Tue, 01 Oct 2024 01:29:59 -0400 Researchers question the use of "cancer" for certain prostate conditions
研究人员通过泛体微生物组分析发现了新的与疾病相关的微生物物种德国的研究人员进行了泛机体微生物组分析，发现了新的微生物物种和与疾病相关的潜在疗法，对诊断和治疗的进步具有重要意义。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Researchers-uncover-new-disease-linked-microbial-species-through-pan-body-microbiome-analysis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Researchers-uncover-new-disease-linked-microbial-species-through-pan-body-microbiome-analysis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=644024b0-b934-4508-8fe3-4766ad617687 Tue, 01 Oct 2024 01:12:00 -0400 Researchers uncover new disease-linked microbial species through pan-body microbiome analysis
研究强调排他性纪律的负面后果停学或开除学生是学校可以对学生实施的最严厉的惩罚之一，而且可能会造成终生的、毁灭性的后果。在最新的政策声明中，美国儿科学会建议采用创伤知情的方法来支持学生并减少排除性纪律的需要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Study-highlights-negative-consequences-of-exclusionary-discipline.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Study-highlights-negative-consequences-of-exclusionary-discipline.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d2f00d1f-48e2-4327-bf01-04dd8cf941bb Tue, 01 Oct 2024 00:50:22 -0400 Study highlights negative consequences of exclusionary discipline
社会经济劣势预示着心脏移植患者的预后较差加州大学洛杉矶分校的新研究表明，与生活在社会经济条件较好地区的患者相比，生活在社会经济条件较差地区的心脏移植患者更有可能出现术后并发症并在五年内死亡，即使这些患者是在一流的大容量医院进行移植的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Socioeconomic-disadvantage-predicts-poorer-outcomes-for-heart-transplant-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/Socioeconomic-disadvantage-predicts-poorer-outcomes-for-heart-transplant-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a527473-d486-4cde-aa0e-b9b15f638dba Tue, 01 Oct 2024 00:44:45 -0400 Socioeconomic disadvantage predicts poorer outcomes for heart transplant patients
孕妇的 COVID-19 疫苗接种率高于预期一项对 2022 年以来超过 28,000 名孕妇的研究发现，大多数孕妇在首次发布时接种了 COVID-19 疫苗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/COVID-19-vaccine-uptake-among-pregnant-women-higher-than-expected.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241001/COVID-19-vaccine-uptake-among-pregnant-women-higher-than-expected.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4484fb9f-1aec-4c26-9eb7-1517bdfc8d7e Tue, 01 Oct 2024 00:40:30 -0400 COVID-19 vaccine uptake among pregnant women higher than expected
